channel.title: How Do I
channel.description: Well.. I Got Hand Cannon And Cannon Shots But.. When I Wear My Cannon With The Cannon Shots.. I Attack Just Like If My Hand Cannon Was A Melee Wepon, How Do I Change That So I Use The Cannon Shots And My Hand Cannon Is A Range Wep??

item.title: How Do I
item.dc:creator: @Funny_Man Funny Man
item.description:
@Funny_Man wrote:

Well… I Got Hand Cannon And Cannon Shots But… When I Wear My Cannon With The Cannon Shots… I Attack Just Like If My Hand Cannon Was A Melee Wepon, How Do I Change That So I Use The Cannon Shots And My Hand Cannon Is A Range Wep??

Read full topic
